title: Opalescence 35% PF Melon Refill Kit - Pack of 4 Syringes - 5404
features: Opalescence tooth whitening gel contains PF (potassium nitrate and fluoride)
Opalescence is effective in helping reduce shade relapse as compared to competitor tooth bleaching products
Opalescence whitening gel is made up of at least 20% water which helps prevent dehydration.
Sticky, viscous gel won’t migrate to soft tissues and ensures tray stays securely in place
description: For use with customized take-home whitening trays, Opalescence PF tooth whitening gel offers many options for patients. With its easy syringe delivery, Opalescence PF whitening gel is easily customizable for each patient’s individual situation. The gel contains 20% water to prevent dehydration, and the sticky, viscous formula helps keep the gel and tray in place. With five concentrations and three flavors, patients can completely customize their whitening experience.
